text: Kuznetsk () is a town in Penza Oblast, Russia, located in the foothills of the Volga Upland, mainly on the left bank of the Truyov River. Population: == Twin towns and sister cities == Kuznetsk is twinned with: * Gyula, Hungary (1970) * Dimitrovgrad, Russia (1972) == References == Category:Cities and towns in Penza Oblast
title: Kuznetsk
